<div class="football-weekly-august__wrapper"><style>#football-weekly.fc-container--thrasher,#football-weekly.fc-container--thrasher .fc-item,.football-weekly__wrapper,section#football-weekly-august.fc-container--thrasher{background-color:#333}.football-weekly__wrapper{width:100%;position:relative;overflow:hidden;font-family:"Guardian Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif}.football-weekly-august__wrapper{width:100%}section#football-weekly-august.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner,section#football-weekly-august.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner .fc-container__body .fc-slice-wrapper .facia-snap,section#football-weekly-august.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner .fc-container__body .fc-slice-wrapper ul{overflow:visible}section#football-weekly-august a.fc-trail__count.fc-trail__count--commentcount{display:none!important}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher{background-color:#333;width:auto;position:relative;padding:12px;min-height:130px;overflow:hidden}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .branding{position:absolute;top:8px;right:22px;width:52px;height:33px}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .branding svg{width:100%;height:100%}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .figure img{width:260px;position:absolute;bottom:-105px;right:22%;z-index:99999}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player{height:140px;width:362px;white-space:nowrap;position:absolute;top:6px;right:96px;background-color:transparent}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__circle{padding:1px;display:inline-block;height:140px;width:140px;position:absolute;top:0}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__circle svg{height:100%;width:100%}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__name{left:29%;z-index:310}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__illustration{display:none;left:29%;z-index:300}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__playing{left:59.5%;z-index:19;-webkit-transform:scale(.97,.97);transform:scale(.97,.97);opacity:0;-webkit-transition:opacity 160ms,-webkit-transform 160ms;transition:opacity 160ms,transform 160ms}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__play{cursor:pointer;left:59.5%;z-index:310;opacity:1;-webkit-transform:scale(1,1);transform:scale(1,1);-webkit-transition:opacity 240ms,-webkit-transform 240ms;transition:opacity 240ms,transform 240ms}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__play:hover{opacity:.95}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher[data-playing] .player .player__play{-webkit-transform:scale(.92,.92);transform:scale(.92,.92);opacity:0}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher[data-playing] .player .player__playing{-webkit-transform:scale(1,1);transform:scale(1,1);opacity:1}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info{width:400px;margin-top:-5px;margin-left:30px;position:relative;z-index:300}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info .episode-info__heading{display:block;font-size:28px;line-height:28px;font-family:'Guardian Egyptian Web',serif;font-weight:500}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info .episode-info__heading .episode-info__kicker{display:block;color:#FB0}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info .episode-info__heading .episode-info__title{color:#FFF}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info_full{position:relative;right:1px;display:inline-block;height:26px;line-height:28px;overflow:hidden;font-size:13px;padding-left:12px;padding-right:30px;margin:14px 0 30px;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid currentColor;color:#FB0;font-family:'Guardian Text Sans Web'}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info_full .episode-info__arrow{position:absolute;right:10px;top:2px;width:1em;height:1em}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info_full .episode-info__arrow svg{width:100%;height:100%}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info_full:hover{background-color:#fb0;color:#444;text-decoration:none}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .episode-info_full:hover #right-arrow{fill:#444}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:40px;font-family:'Guardian Text Sans Web';font-size:13px;padding-bottom:2px;color:#ddd;z-index:300}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__download,#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__feed,#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__icon,#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__itunes{display:inline-block}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__icon{position:relative;top:2px;margin-right:1px}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__download:after,#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .subscription__itunes:after{content:'';display:inline-block;width:1px;height:20px;background-color:#ccc;opacity:.8;vertical-align:top;position:relative;top:2px;margin:0 6px}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .circles-wrapper{position:absolute;z-index:100;left:-300px;top:0;bottom:0;right:-300px;overflow:hidden}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher
